title: Spurious LLDB segfault (signal 11)

labels.name: A-spurious
labels.description: Area: Spurious failures in builds (spuriously == for no apparent reason)

labels.name: T-infra
labels.description: Relevant to the infrastructure team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
Symptom: `debuginfo-lldb` tests failed with signal 11. Only happens on macOS (others use GDB) and usually i686, and only one test is failing. 

Example logs (look for "`status: signal: 11`"):

```
[01:40:10] failures:
[01:40:10] 
[01:40:10] ---- [debuginfo-lldb] debuginfo/lexical-scopes-in-block-expression.rs stdout ----
[01:40:10] 	NOTE: compiletest thinks it is using LLDB version 360
[01:40:10] 
[01:40:10] error: Error while running LLDB
[01:40:10] status: signal: 11
[01:40:10] command: "/usr/bin/python" "/Users/travis/build/rust-lang/rust/src/etc/lldb_batchmode.py" "/Users/travis/build/rust-lang/rust/build/x86_64-apple-darwin/test/debuginfo/lexical-scopes-in-block-expression.stage2-x86_64-apple-darwin" "/Users/travis/build/rust-lang/rust/build/x86_64-apple-darwin/test/debuginfo/lexical-scopes-in-block-expression.debugger.script"
[01:40:10] stdout:
[01:40:10] ------------------------------------------
[01:40:10] LLDB batch-mode script
[01:40:10] ----------------------
...
```

Affected PRs:

* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/44967#issuecomment-336002300 (x86_64-apple-darwin :: lexical-scopes-in-block-expression.rs)
* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/45192#issuecomment-335785253 (i686-apple-darwin :: by-value-non-immediate-argument.rs)
* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/45141#issuecomment-335356808 (i686-apple-darwin :: self-in-generic-default-method.rs)
* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/44605#issuecomment-329956937 (i686-apple-darwin :: lexical-scope-in-unique-closure.rs)
* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/44194#issuecomment-326928819 (i686-apple-darwin :: static-method-on-struct-and-enum.rs)
* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/44046#issuecomment-324990620 (x86_64-apple-darwin :: generic-method-on-generic-struct.rs)
* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/44000#issuecomment-323609848 (x86_64-apple-darwin :: name-shadowing-and-scope-nesting.rs)
* https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/42394#issuecomment-306037669 (i686-apple-darwin :: lexical-scope-in-if.rs)

Related: #42693 (GDB failed due to `ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_QUOTA` on Windows)
